thread.section_title: Trekkinn.com opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Trekkinn.com | www.trekkinn.com
thread.title: Cormac

author: Cormac
title: Cormac
text:
I purchased an Arc'Teryx jacket from these guys. Ordered on the 25Jan and was advised the delivery would be between 03-09Feb. The jacket was delivered today (08Feb).
I have read a number bad reviews about this company but I guess it's best to order an in stock item and know that delivery is going to take its time.
Knowing this I would have no problem buying from their website again.
